publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2058# Mr Kenny MacAskill: Community Radio - Leith FM—That the Parliament congratulates Leith FM on being granted a restricted service licence to broadcast throughout December; recognises the important role that community radio can play in local business, culture, education and community involvement, and supports Leith FM’s bid to Ofcom for a five-year community radio licence.
S2M-2058# Community Radio - Leith FM (lodged on 23 November 2004) Brian Adam*, Rob Gibson*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Robin Harper*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*

S2M-2058# Mr Kenny MacAskill: Community Radio - Leith FM—That the Parliament congratulates Leith FM on being granted a restricted service licence to broadcast throughout December; recognises the important role that community radio can play in local business, culture, education and community involvement, and supports Leith FM’s bid to Ofcom for a five-year community radio licence. Supported by: Brian Adam, Rob Gibson, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Robin Harper, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Fiona Hyslop*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*
S2M-2058# Community Radio - Leith FM (lodged on 23 November 2004) Chris Ballance*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-2058# Community Radio - Leith FM (lodged on 23 November 2004) Colin Fox*
S2M-2058# Community Radio - Leith FM (lodged on 23 November 2004) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-2058# Community Radio - Leith FM (lodged on 23 November 2004) Frances Curran*
S2M-2058# Community Radio - Leith FM (lodged on 23 November 2004) Rosie Kane*
